title: overheating of the smartphone during everyday use
content:
hello community,

can you tell me what i should do? i've had my pixel 3 phone for almost 2 years, and somewhere since last summer it started overheating. Now the standard CPU temperature is 40-45 degrees when reading web sites, messengers, google-feed.
Unfortunately, because of this there is constant throttling and constant glitches in the interface and apps.

android 11, all updates installed.

Thanks in advanced.
